Name: Triblock
About the game: It's puzzle game. Combine 3 or more same block in any direction for remove defined figure. Sounds easy. Game features simple graphics, nothing more; 60 puzzle levels for spending your time; infinity mode for spending your time more; changeable pictures for blocks; simple control, maximum enjoy.
